title: Ingredients of love
creator_credit: Jenni Klempfner, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Jenni Klempfner explores her ancestors’ Polish and Jewish heritage as well as her own multi-cultural family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Jenni Klempfner, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
